0.5.name: wordpress/multi-purpose-mail-form
0.5.description: The Multi Purpose Mail Form wordpress plugin allows you to add a contact form to your website to allow your visitors to send emails to you directly from your website or blog. The Multi Purpose Mail Form also includes an email subscription form that you can use to capture visitors email addresses for service updates or newsletters. Just paste [mpmf] anywhere in your post or page to display the contact form or [subscribe] to display the subscription form. This wordpress plugin sends all data submitted via your website or blog to your email address.
